notes.title: Author Contributions
notes.p: M.S.M. carried out the nuclei isolation, PCT-based lysis and digestion, TMT labeling, stage tip bSDB fractionation, and data analyses. R.S.W. and T.T.L. carried out the LC-MS/MS/MS data collection. The biostatical analyses were carried out by M.S.M. and G.P. with advice from H.Z., M.S.M. wrote the first draft of the manuscript that was edited initially by K.R.W. and A.C.N. and then by all other co-authors. K.R.W. and A.C.N. supervised all aspects of the work. All authors have read and agreed to the published version of the manuscript.
